om,Oman,Finance,6015,1,763499293,Bank Muscat Mobile Banking,Bank Muscat (S.A.O.G),https://apps.apple.com/om/app/bank-muscat-mobile-banking/id763499293?uo=4,0.0,3.61538,884,Finance,"Bank Muscat Mobile Banking
Manage your money securely, pay bills, transfer funds and access your account 24/7.

Bank Muscat Mobile Banking (mBanking) is your trusted digital banking app in Oman. With a clean, secure and user-friendly experience, you can manage your finances anytime, anywhere without visiting a branch.
Key Features:

column3: 24/7 secure access to your accounts.
Pay your bills and instantly top-up your mobile numbers.
Transfer money within and outside Oman.
Apply/renew your cards.
Generate or change your card PIN instantly.
Report lost cards and block them instantly.
Link multiple accounts to a single debit card.

column1: Built for Oman:

column3: Available in Arabic and English.
Built-in security and encryption.
Trusted by millions of users.

column1: Download the Bank Muscat mBanking app now and take control of your finances from the palm of your hand.
Bank Muscat
الخدمات المصرفية عبر الهاتف النقال من بنك مسقط
قم بإدارة أموالك بأمان، وادفع الفواتير، وتحويل الأموال والوصول إلى حسابك 24/7.

الخدمات المصرفية عبر الهاتف النقال من بنك مسقط (mBanking) هو تطبيقك المصرفي الرقمي الموثوق به في سلطنة عمان. من خلال تجربة سلسة وآمنة وسهلة الاستخدام، يمكنك إدارة أموالك في أي وقت وفي أي مكان دون الحاجة إلى زيارة الفرع.
الميزات الأساسية:

column3: متاح على مدار الساعة طوال أيام الأسبوع
دفع الفواتير وإعادة شحن أرقام الهواتف النقالة على الفور.
تحويل الأموال داخل وخارج عُمان.
التقدم بطلب للحصول وتجديد البطاقات.
إنشاء أو تغيير الرقم السري لبطاقتك على الفور.
الإبلاغ عن البطاقات المفقودة وحظرها على الفور.
ربط حسابات متعددة ببطاقة خصم مباشر واحدة.

column1: صممت خصيصًا لسلطنة عمان:

column3: متوفرة باللغتين العربية والإنجليزية.
مزودة بأعلى مستويات الأمان.
موثوق بها من قبل ملايين المستخدمين.

column1: قم بتحميل تطبيق بنك مسقط للخدمات المصرفية عبر الهاتف النقال الآن وتحكم في أموالك بلمسة زر!

om,Oman,Finance,6015,2,6477771964,Qpay Oman,FINTECH SOLUTIONS (OM),https://apps.apple.com/om/app/qpay-oman/id6477771964?uo=4,0.0,2.90991,111,Finance,"Qpay is a licensed Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) service provider in Oman, offering 0% interest installment plans for customers. Qpay also enables you to check your available credit and offers a seamless, interest-free payment experience that makes shopping more flexible and affordable. Whether you’re at home or on the go, Qpay ensures that your financial needs are met in the easiest possible way.""
Key Features:
-Browse stores and merchants that accept Qpay for BNPL services.
-View and manage your payments and installment plans.
-Reschedule payments to better fit your schedule.
-Make enforcement payments with ease.
-Track your available credit status with Qpay.
-Experience 0% interest installment plans for your purchases.

Qpay provides a safe and secure way to shop and manage your finances, offering complete transparency and no hidden fees. Start using Qpay today for smarter shopping!",2025-04-21T07:00:00Z,2025-11-01T14:20:51Z

om,Oman,Finance,6015,8,1511347191,Thawani Pay,Thawani Technologies LLC,https://apps.apple.com/om/app/thawani-pay/id1511347191?uo=4,0.0,3.4886,307,Finance,"Thawani Technologies LLC was established in March 2016 as an Omani company that specialized in providing innovative E-Payment solutions.

Thawani Pay Provides smart innovative payment solutions through mobile phones and other electronic channels. The system has been tailored locally to meet local market requirements and comply with local and global regulations and standards such as PCI-DSS Standard that is specialized in ensuring a secure environment for the system and the work environment, and PA-DSS that is specialized in ensuring the security level of the payment application used in the mobile phone.

Thawani Pay aims through this platform to provide a secure environment that can be acquired easily by Merchants and users. This service is not requiring any additional infrastructure setup or devices, the only thing that the merchant need is, to print a sticker with a unique QR code that has their information so that the user can easily scan the QR code through the Thawani application and complete the payment process in few easy and simple steps.

Moreover, Thawani Pay app offers another feature for the merchants by enabling them to send mobile invoice to the customer direct from the application with a brief explanation about the product or service, which enables the customer to pay to the merchant right from the app regardless of wherever is he.
Thawani Pay Also offer several integration codes that enable the merchant to integrate current billing or ERP system with Thawani and be able to accept and pay directly from within their system.
billing companies can also make use of these APIs by integrating to Thawani Pay to offer bill payment throughout the Thawani Pay mobile application.",2020-05-13T07:00:00Z,2025-11-19T04:09:20Z

om,Oman,Finance,6015,11,1359763701,Exness Trade: Online Trading,Exness Global Limited,https://apps.apple.com/om/app/exness-trade-online-trading/id1359763701?uo=4,0.0,4.52576,660,Finance,"Is Exness Trade the feature-rich trading app you have been waiting for? We think so. Access the world’s financial markets and trade stocks, gold and more … wherever, whenever. Get the Exness Trade trading app now.
AN ONLINE TRADING APP LIKE NO OTHER
Control your online trading accounts with ease, even when you are away from your desktop. With the Exness Trade trading app, you can:
• Trade stocks, gold, oil, indices and more
• Get essential notifications about your balance, trading activity and more
• View your open, pending and closed trades
• Open an unlimited number of new accounts on the trading app
• Test and improve your online trading skills on your free demo account
• Chat to our live in-app support 24/7
• Strategise and spot your next trade using our free market news and analysis
ABOUT OUR TRADING APP PLATFORM

The Exness Trade trading app features a state-of-the-art trading terminal. Users feel right at home on Exness Trade as this advanced trading app delivers the advanced functionality they love, and so much more.
• Open your live and risk-free demo accounts quickly and easily
• Trade hundreds of popular tradable assets on the Exness Trade trading app
• Add your favourite assets to the Watchlist and trade when you see an opportunity
• Use advanced charting to analyse market trends.
• Stay on top of the markets with price alerts & notifications.
• Control your risk with a range of trading tools.
• Enjoy stable pricing even when you trade in volatile markets

*""Best spreads"" means the tightest and most stable spreads. ""Most stable"" refers to the lowest maximum spreads, and ""tightest"" refers to the tightest average spreads – offered on Exness Pro accounts – for the above-mentioned instruments. These are compared to spreads across commission-free accounts of other top brokers over the specified period.
*Payment processing times may vary depending on the chosen provider.
WHAT YOU CAN TRADE ON THE TRADING APP
At Exness, you'll find a wide range of top tradable assets on our platforms including metals, stocks, oil and indices.
*Trading is risky. T&Cs apply.

¹At Exness, over 98% of withdrawals are processed automatically. ""Fastest withdrawals"" refers to a comparison of Exness’ withdrawal processing time vs. 3 other brokers, last updated on 07.05.2025. Processing times may vary depending on the chosen payment method.
¹USOIL spread reduction refers to average spreads on Pro accounts, sampled over the first full trading week of May 2024 vs. the last full trading week of August 2025.
¹On Pro accounts comparing last trading week of 07.2024 vs. the last trading week of 08.2025.
²Delays and slippage may occur. No guarantee of execution speed or precision is provided.
ABOUT EXNESS

Founded in 2008, Exness is a regulated multi-asset broker that provides the most advanced online trading solutions to traders from around the world. Known for consistently delivering better-than-market conditions to its clients, Exness also pushes the boundaries of online trading services through the development of standout features such as Stop Out Protection, Price Gap Protection, the Exness Trade trading app and other innovations.
Exness Global Limited
Siafi 1, PORTO BELLO Building, Flat 401, 3042 Limassol, Cyprus",2019-01-23T03:57:56Z,2025-11-13T19:30:02Z

om,Oman,Finance,6015,12,1628877661,Bank Muscat Soft Token,Bank Muscat (S.A.O.G),https://apps.apple.com/om/app/bank-muscat-soft-token/id1628877661?uo=4,0.0,2.05435,92,Finance,"Bank Muscat Soft Token App enables Retail/individual customers authenticate Internet Banking transactions anytime, anywhere 24 x 7. It serves as a replacement for the physical token, eliminating the need to carry around or utilize the physical token.
In BM Soft Token App you can:
•         Approve your financial transaction by tapping on push notifications received on your registered mobile device.
•         Authenticate your Non-Financial transactions through Soft One-Time Password (OTP).
•         Fallback authentication through Coloured QR code if push notification is not received.
•         This service is completely free of cost and available in English and Arabic.
The Soft Token facility is not available to the following:
•         Joint account holders.
•         Corporate Internet Banking customers.
•         Meethaq customers.

To use this app, you must be a Personal banking customer (joint and corporate accounts are not eligible) who is registered for Bank Muscat Internet Banking. If you have not yet registered, please visit https://www.bankmuscatonline.com and register yourself.
Already an Internet Banking Customer? Download the Bank Muscat Soft Token App now and enjoy a convenient and secure banking experience!",2022-08-20T07:00:00Z,2025-04-09T05:41:57Z

om,Oman,Finance,6015,15,283646709,"PayPal - Send, Manage, Pay","PayPal, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/om/app/paypal-send-manage-pay/id283646709?uo=4,0.0,4.57897,1760,Finance,"There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal
SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure
ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​

*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.
MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​

Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply
BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing
SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply
MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
